description: [Kimsuky](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0094) has obtained and used tools such as Nirsoft WebBrowserPassVIew, [Mimikatz](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0002), and [PsExec](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0029).(Citation: Netscout Stolen Pencil Dec 2018)(Citation: Talos Kimsuky Nov 2021)
